title: Bug 138175 - Bookmark link set in drill through link should be saved in Hyperlink Options dialog.
OB: The selected bookmark is not displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog when it is reopened, even though it is saved in the XML source.
EB:
Bug 138175 - Bookmark link set in drill through link should be saved in Hyperlink Options dialog.

Description: The selected bookmark is not displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog when it is reopened, even though it is saved in the XML source.
Steps to reproduce:

1. Open the Hyperlink Options dialog.
2. Set a bookmark link in a drill through link.
3. Reopen the Hyperlink Options dialog.

Result: The selected bookmark is gone but it is saved in the XML source.
Expected result: The target bookmark should be displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog.
SR: The issue should be fixed so that the selected bookmark is properly displayed in the Hyperlink Options dialog when it is reopened.
